text: وَإِن كَانَ قَمِيصُهُۥ قُدَّ مِن دُبُرٍ فَكَذَبَتْ وَهُوَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ

translation.en.sahih: But if his shirt is torn from the back, then she has lied, and he is of the truthful."
translation.id.indonesian: Dan jika baju gamisnya koyak di belakang, maka wanita itulah yang dusta, dan Yusuf termasuk orang-orang yang benar".
